oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Three flavour oscillation interpretation of neutrino data
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SANKAR, SU
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: atmospheric neutrinos
solar
kamiokande
flux

matter

neutrino oscillations
three flavours
solar neutrinos

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: I consider the mixing of the three active neutrino flavours and obtain the constraints on the parameters of this mixing from the solar, atmospheric and reactor neutrino data.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: XIII DAE Symposium on High Energy Physics,CHANDIGARH, INDIA,DEC 26-30, 1998
